  • Method Details

    • schurTest

      protected static Matrix schurTest​(Matrix A, boolean complex, boolean computeQ)
      Computes the Schur decomposition of this matrix. That is decomposes a symmetric matrix A such that A = QRQ-1 where Q is an orthogonal matrix thus Q-1=Q* where Q* is the conjugate transpose of Q, and R is an upper-triangular matrix which contains the eigenvalues of A along its diagonal.
      Parameters:
      A - - Matrix to decompose
      Returns:
      An array of matrices of length two containing in order [Q, E].

    • schurDecomp
